code:
dist = None
angle = None


while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  dist = get_cam().find_color('#96b73c')[0]
  angle = get_cam().find_color('#96b73c')[1]
  Command.get_cam().set_text(''.join([str(x) for x in ['Distance: ', dist, ' angle: ', angle]]))
